mapper.update:
update czb_enterprise_info
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_info = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where enterprise_info_id = #{enterpriseInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update czb_enterprise_info set enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_info = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where enterprise_info_id = #{enterpriseInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT identify_code,person_car_id,person_name,person_id_card,car_license,plan_name,plan_amount,rent_back_money FROM czb_cars_persons LEFT JOIN czb_service_plan ON czb_cars_persons.plan_id = czb_service_plan.plan_id LEFT JOIN czb_contract_records a ON contract_record_id = record_id LEFT JOIN czb_contract_records b ON a.contract_father_id = b.record_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
